description:
With the fate of Earth hanging in the balance, Subaru and the others continue their desperate battle against the fearsome Hekatonkheires. In the midst of the fighting, Subaru finds something that really shouldn`t be there...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: BATTLE OF THE HEKATONKHEIRES PART II
